revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #11 Bluk |image = [[File:Bluk.png]] |caption = Though this small, delicately skinned Berry is blue in color, it dyes the mouth black when eaten. |growtime = 5m 30s |harvest = 9 berries |replant = 40% |points = 20 |flavor =
* 0 spicy * 10 dry * 10 sweet * 0 bitter * 0 sour }} === Description === '''Bluk''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Chesto]] and at least 1 [[Leppa]]. === Growth Tables === ==== Growth Stages ==== {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 3 mins 20 secs || 4 mins 10 secs || 5 mins || 5 mins 30 secs - 11 mins 40 secs |- !Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:BlukTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:BlukTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:BlukTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Flow Chart ===
{| style="text-align: center;" |+ '''Flow Chart to get this berry''' |- | Random
Drop || || Random
Drop |- | ↓ || || ↓ |- | [[File:Chesto.png|20px]] [[Chesto]] || + || [[File:Leppa.png|20px]] [[Leppa]] |- | colspan="3" | ↓ || |- | || [[File:Bluk.png|20px]] [[Bluk]] |}
=== Mutation Strategy === ==== Possible Planting Formations ==== You can fill your [[farm]] in the following way to obtain Bluk berries. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || style="width: 40px;" | |- | || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] || || || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || || || [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || |- | || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] || || || [[File:Leppa.png|30px]] [[Leppa]] |} ==== Timing Table ==== {| class="collapsible wikitable"| style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch/Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch*Sprayduck |- | [[Leppa]] || - || - || - |- | [[Chesto]] || 40 secs until ripe || 26 secs until ripe || Not Practical |- |} {{Berries}}
